title: Support for Belarusian Families
short_description: Helping families affected by political unrest in Belarus
description:
This campaign aims to provide financial assistance to families who have been affected by the ongoing political situation in Belarus. Your donations will help cover basic needs such as food, housing, and medical expenses.

We work directly with local organizations to ensure that funds reach those who need it most.

title: Ukrainian Refugee Relief Fund
description: As the conflict continues, millions of Ukrainians have been displaced. This fund provides immediate relief for refugees including housing, food, and essential supplies.

title: Medical Equipment for Hospitals
short_description: Supporting healthcare facilities with critical equipment
description: Hospitals in affected regions are in urgent need of medical equipment. Your donation helps purchase vital supplies.

title: Education Support Program
description: Many children have been forced to leave their schools. This program provides educational materials and support for displaced students.

title: Emergency Food Distribution
short_description: Providing meals to those in need
description: Food security is critical. This campaign supports food distribution centers in affected areas.

title: Mental Health Support
description: Trauma counseling is essential for those affected by conflict and displacement. This fund supports mental health professionals.

title: Winter Clothing Drive
short_description: Warm clothing for those facing harsh winters
description: Winter can be particularly difficult for displaced families. This campaign provides warm clothing and blankets.

title: Children's Safety Fund
description: Children need safe spaces and protection. This fund supports child protection programs.

title: Legal Aid Services
description: Legal documentation and aid services are crucial for refugees navigating new systems.

title: Transportation Assistance
description: Transportation costs can be a barrier to safety. This fund covers travel expenses for those in need.
